name: Halloween on Sweet Street
description:
In Halloween on Sweet Street, you play as Meggy (age 9) trick-or-treating by herself for the first time. Explore the neighborhood on Halloween night, but watch out for candy-stealing bigger kids. Use Candy Weapons to fend them off so you can get as much candy as possible! Beware of Randy, though; that guy will stop at nothing to rob a little girl of her precious candy.

(This game was made in 13 days for Trick or Treat Jam 2021.)

Features:

  • 3 Candy Weapons: pelt enemies with candy corn, whip them with black licorice, and defend yourself with sugar-free gum
  • 3 Enemy Types: Ghost Kid, Mummy Girl, and Pumpkin Guy are on the prowl and looking for sweets
  • 2 Modes of Play: go for a high score in Normal Mode, or speedrun through Time Attack
  • Helpful tips from Meggy's big bro (check the pause screen)
  • A secret on the title screen(?)
  • Randy

Controls (Mouse + Keyboard only):

  • WASD - Move
  • Space Bar - Dash
  • Mouse - Aim Candy Weapon
  • Left Click - Use Candy Weapon
  • Right Click - Interact with doors
  • Q/E or Mouse Wheel - Change Candy Weapon
  • Esc or P - Pause Game
  • Left/Right - Adjust Volume
